scp.message: Is this an SAP Business Technology Platform system?

ui5AbapRepo.messageMaxLength: SAPUI5 ABAP Repository (Maximum length: 15 characters, should start with {{ applicationPrefix }})
ui5AbapRepo.hint: Enter the name for the deployed application. The name must follow the rules of creating a BSP application. It must not exceed 15 characters and must consist of alphanumeric characters or underscores only. Name should be unique in the BSP repository and its namespace is compatible with the selected package.

description.hint: The description of the deployed application.

packageInputChoice.message: How do you want to enter the package?

packageManual.hint: Provide a package for the deployed application.

packageAutocomplete.hint: Select a package for the deployed application.
packageAutocomplete.sourceMessage: More than {{numResults}} results, keep typing to narrow down

common.provideTransportRequest: Provide a transport request for your application

transportInputChoice.message: How do you want to enter the transport request?

overwrite.message: Editing the deployment configuration will overwrite existing configuration, are you sure you want to continue?
overwrite.hint: Deployment config will abort if you choose no. Click Finish to abort.

warnings.packageNotFound: Package list cannot be fetched. Please enter the Package manually.
warnings.transportConfigFailure:
Cannot get transport configuration from the backend. You can still proceed with deployment configuration by manually providing the package and transport request needed. 
For more information on this error, please see Guided Answers {{helpLink}}
warnings.noTransportReqs: There are no Transport Requests for the supplied package. You can choose to create a new one now or during deployment
warnings.noExistingTransportReqList: Transport Request list cannot be fetched. Please enter Transport Request manually.
warnings.virtualHost: The destination is using a virtual host, you will need to replace the host in the URL with the internal host that is configured with your SAP Cloud Connector when viewing your deployed application.

errors.abapSystemChoices: Failed to get ABAP system choices
errors.targetNotDeployable: {{systemError}} To continue with project generation choose a different deployment target or skip adding deploy config.
errors.cannotReadCapServiceMetadata: An error occurred reading CAP service metadata: {{serviceName}}. See log for more details.
errors.invalidClient: [{{client}}] is invalid. Enter blank or a value between 000-999
errors.debugAbapTargetSystem: Error while getting ABAP target system during {{method}}, error {{error}}
errors.s4SystemNoExtensible: S4 system not configured as Extensibility Development system. Cannot deploy to it.
errors.incorrectAtoSettings: Incorrect ATO settings. Package or prefix settings mising.
errors.atoUnauthorisedSystem: Authentication required to access the ATO Service
errors.createTransportReqFailed: Create new Transport Request failed. Please enter Transport Request manually.
errors.requireCredentials: Please provide credentials to authenticate with backend system

validators.appNameInvalidLength: Application name limited to 15 characters, entered {{length}}
validators.appNameInvalidPrefix: Application name needs to be prefixed with [{{prefix}}]
validators.abapAppDescLength: Deployment Description should not exceed 60 characters
validators.abapTransportNumRequired: Provide a transport request for your application
validators.abapInvalidNamespace: Namespace invalid as there are too many forward slashes
validators.abapInvalidAppNameLength: Application name limited to 15 characters, entered {{length}}
validators.abapInvalidAppName: Application name needs to be prefixed with [{{prefix}}]
validators.charactersForbiddenInAppName: Only alphanumeric, underscore and slash characters are allowed
validators.invalidNamespace: Namespace invalid as there are too many forward slashes
validators.forbiddenCharacters: Only alphanumeric, underscore and slash characters are allowed
validators.descriptionLength: Deployment Description should not exceed 60 characters
validators.transportListPreReqs: Name (SAPUI5 ABAP Repository) and Package are required to retrieve the existing Transport Requests
